alert.note: Alert for Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 6:17PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Paz, northeastern Imperial and Riverside Counties through 645 PM MST/645 PM PDT/... At 615 PM MST/615 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Cibola, or 31 miles northwest of Martinez Lake, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cibola and Palo Verde. This includes CA Route 78 between mile markers 63 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
